A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gonna go down as the last great Star Wars film\, marred mostly be scam Youtubers begging for clicks. I know most will say \"It's not flawless...\" but forget that. If people want to give it 1 Star for treating Luke like a human being instead of some EU god who could use the dark and lightside of the force at will\, I don't need to bother explaining. For certain the throne room scene is the greatest in the entire Star Wars saga.
